Admissions are open! You can apply online through our website or visit the admission office. The process includes document verification and merit-based selection.
To get admission, visit our website at https://www.agpit.edu.in/ for the online application form. You can also visit our admission office for direct assistance.
The admission process is simple: Fill the application form → Submit required documents → Merit list will be published → Complete the admission formalities.
For admission details including eligibility criteria, required documents, and deadlines, please check our official website or contact our admission office.

We offer B.Tech and various diploma programs including Computer Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, and Electrical Engineering. Visit https://www.agpit.edu.in/ for detailed course information.
Our institute provides quality engineering education with B.Tech (4 years) and Diploma (3 years) programs in multiple branches. Check our website for complete course details and syllabus.
Available courses: B.Tech & Diploma in Computer, Mechanical, Civil, and Electrical Engineering. Each program is designed with industry-relevant curriculum.
We have comprehensive engineering programs. For detailed course structure, fee, and admission requirements, visit our website at https://www.agpit.edu.in/
We have highly experienced faculty members from reputed institutions with excellent academic and industry backgrounds. Check our website for detailed faculty profiles at https://www.agpit.edu.in/
Our faculty consists of qualified professors, associate professors, and assistant professors with Ph.D. and M.Tech degrees. They bring both academic excellence and industry experience.
The institute boasts of experienced teaching staff committed to quality education. Visit our website to view individual faculty profiles and their qualifications.
Our faculty members are well-qualified professionals dedicated to student success. For complete faculty information, please visit https://www.agpit.edu.in/
The fee structure varies by course and is quite reasonable. Please visit our official website or contact the accounts department for detailed fee information and payment options.
We offer competitive fee structure for all courses. For specific fee details, installment options, and scholarship information, please contact our accounts office.
Fee structure depends on the program you choose. We also provide various scholarship opportunities. Visit our website or call +91-9765631696 for detailed information.
Our institute offers affordable quality education. For complete fee breakdown, payment schedule, and available scholarships, please check with our accounts department.

Our institute provides excellent facilities including well-equipped labs, library, computer center, workshops, sports facilities, and more. For detailed infrastructure information, visit https://www.agpit.edu.in/
We have modern infrastructure with state-of-the-art laboratories, digital library, hostel accommodation, sports complex, and student-friendly environment to support your learning journey.
Campus facilities include: Modern labs, Well-stocked library, Computer center, Workshop facilities, Sports ground, and canteen. Visit our website for more details!

Our institute has a dedicated placement cell that works closely with various companies for student placements. We provide career guidance and job assistance to help students secure good opportunities.
We maintain good placement records with tie-ups with various industries. Our placement cell conducts training sessions, mock interviews, and coordinates with companies for recruitment drives.
The institute focuses on overall personality development and provides placement assistance. For detailed placement statistics and company partnerships, please contact our placement cell.
We organize various technical and cultural events throughout the year including tech fests, cultural programs, competitions, and workshops to enhance student skills and engagement.
Our institute hosts annual technical festivals, cultural events, guest lectures, workshops, and competitions. These events provide excellent opportunities for learning and networking.
Students can participate in numerous events like technical competitions, cultural shows, sports meets, and educational workshops. Stay tuned to our website for upcoming events!
